name: SmartCommunity.in
tag_list: society-management, apartment-management, res-dential-society-management, smart-community, energy-management, society-billing, electricity-billing, collection, automatic-meter-reading, smart-home, home-control, forum, society-forum, rwa, rwa-management, s
overview: SmartCommunity.in provides a web-based solution for society management for condominiums and residential co-operative housing societies. SmartCommunity.in provides most comprehensive solutions for apartment management, society accounting, RWA management, energy accounting etc. It is developed by industry professionals with the knowledge of the core utility industry and takes care of the real business processes and their complexities. This is the only solution which has been designed for specific needs of the societies and apartment complexes and is not going to burden the residents and administration with unnecessary information. Please visit www.smartcommunity.in for more information or drop a mail at contact@smartcommunity.in for further information.
